entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Stettler 08:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: 1.2°C
Humidity: 75 %
Dewpoint: -2.8°C
Wind: WSW 26 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday: Flurries or rain showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 13 February 2023
